name: limm
description:
limm is a simple game made for #MyFirstGameJam Winter 2017 edition.  

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD. Also: jump - Z, Space; action - X, E.

If the page keeps scrolling with arrow keys, click on the fullscreen button.

Thanks to my friends for supporting me and testing the game. Special thanks to Oroderu ^_^

Source code can be found here.
